shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a remote user's video stream playback pauses/resumes.

dlentry.dd:
This callback is deprecated. You can also use the callback with the following parameters:
(0) and (5).
(2) and (6).

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback when the remote user stops or resumes sending the video stream by calling the method.
section.note: This callback does not work properly when the number of users (in the COMMUNICATION profile) or hosts (in the LIVE_BROADCASTING profile) in the channel exceeds 17.

plentry.pd: The ID of the remote user.

Whether the remote user's video stream playback is paused/resumed:
: Paused.
: Resumed.
